```{julia}
using Pkg
Pkg.activate(".")
using MMJMesh.Topologies
```

# Basic usage

Construct and add element

```{julia}
    cl = ConnectivityList([[4, 1, 9], [1, 4], [9, 8]])

    println("Step 1\n", cl)
    push!(cl, [9, 1, 11])
    println("Step 2\n", cl)
```

Transpose

```{julia}
print(cl')
```

Inverse

```{julia}
display(inverse(cl))
```
